bibl.title: Meaning in Coptic Funerary Sculpture.
bibl.note: Reexamination of a Coptic niche head (Dumbarton Oaks Collection, Acc. 43.6): representation of Dionysus driving a wagon. Oxyrhynchus, second half of the Vth century.
bibl.seg: Vikan Gary, Meaning in Coptic Funerary Sculpture.
Guntram Koch (Hg.), Studien zur frühchristlichen Kunst. II = Göttinger Orientforschungen. II. Reihe, Band 8 (Wiesbaden, 1986) pp. 15-23 et pll. 4-13.
Reexamination of a Coptic niche head (Dumbarton Oaks Collection, Acc. 43.6): representation of Dionysus driving a wagon. Oxyrhynchus, second half of the Vth century.
